content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to create Payment Request in SimplePay for Subcontractors\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All subcontractor invoices must be submitted using a special platform for Subcontractors SimplePay - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://simplepay.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://simplepay.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  This allows the invoice to go through the verification (by Finance team) and approval (by project Management) processes. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review below guidance in case you provide services as a direct contractor or work under your own company. If you are engaged through an agency or third-party entity, then it can be skipped as your invoice will be processed by assigned delegates.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case you are contracted with EPAM entity other than the one mentioned in this guide – please contact \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Subcontractors Finance Asia\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" via email for sharing necessary information regarding invoicing process.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The access to SimplePay platform will be provided at the beginning of month next to the month of your engagement. No additional requests are needed from your side.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The system automatically generates a line item \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"once a month\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for services you record in TIME under your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"project\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" activity. Auto line items move to manager review on the first workday of each month following the reporting month. The main requirement to the correct line generation is a correctly filled time sheet in the TIME application.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your regular activity is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"not project related\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", you need to create \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manual line\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" item choosing Report work option. Please attach a screenshot from TIME or a time sheet in a free form in PDF format to it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some tips for manual line creation you can find on this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=967469957\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".﻿\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please make sure that the rate is applied correctly. If not, please \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request Adjustments\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" on the Platform or contact Subcontractors ops team directly at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Subcontractors Finance Asia\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractorsFinanceAsia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".﻿\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before service line can be added in the invoice, all hours worked must be accepted by the EPAM responsible manager. Once accepted, the line can be included in the invoice item along with your PDF invoice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Invoice can contain one or few lines depending on the number of projects you have worked under. So that, if you have been involved in few projects in reporting period, the lines will be generated separately for each of them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Invoice creation step by step is described on our KB Page –
